import math

n, x, t = map(int, input().split())

print(math.ceil(n / x) * t)


import math

n,x,t = map(int,input().split())

print(math.ceil(n/x)*t) 

n, x, t = map(int, input().split())

if n % x == 0:
    print(t * (n // x))
else:
    print(t * (n // x + 1))

from math import ceil

n,x,t = map(int,input().split())

print(ceil(n/x)*t)
